text: They arrive at a hideout used in underworld affairs. Two suspicious men appear with the stolen jewels, and the crew moves to take them back.
trans: 众人来到一个隐蔽的地下设施，发现携带者被盗珠宝的两个可疑男人，众人立刻动身将他们打倒并带走。

text: Chat Noir leads the party to an empty room that seems to be purposely hidden from the public.
trans: 夏诺瓦引领众人来到一个被隐蔽的很好的空房间中。

name: Chat Noir
text: This is a hideout used by people in the underground world.
trans: 这里是地下世界人们所使用的隐匿处。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: This is kind of exciting! I wonder what we're going to find here.
trans: 有点让人兴奋啊，真好奇在这里能找到些什么呢？

name: Chat Noir
text: Well, we'll have to wait and see. Hm? Sounds like we're not alone.
trans: 只要等着瞧就好了，嗯？看来还有别人在这里。

text: The party hides in the shadows and watch as two suspicious men walk into the room.
trans: 众人躲藏在影子里，发现有两个可疑男子走进了房间。

name: Suspicious Man 1/可疑男子1
text: Hehehe! I can't believe how great this is going!
trans: 哈哈哈，没想到咱们还真是大大的赚到了啊！

name: Suspicious Man 2/可疑男子2
text: Yeah, I never thought we'd get our hands on these treasures!
trans: 对啊，没想到居然真的能拿到这些宝物。

text: Each man pulls a jewel from a pocket hidden in their clothing.
trans: 两个人都从衣服的暗兜中拿出了一块宝石。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Don't tell me those jewels are—
trans: 难道说，他们拿着的宝石是——

name: Chat Noir
text: Yes, those are the stolen jewels we're after.
trans: 没错，那就是被偷走的宝石。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: But how did you know they would be here?
trans: 但是你是怎么知道他们会来这里的呢？

name: Chat Noir
text: Now then. What say we get those jewels back, shall we?
trans: 那么，让我们先把那些宝石拿回来吧。
